basic: Familiar with making complete web pages with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React.
react-package: Use related packages, such as planning routes with React-router and managing state with Redux
api: know how to use NodeJS to set up a server to create API, and use an asynchronous method to call the API at the front-end to obtain data.
style: Ability to style web pages using CSS-in-JS and know how to use CSS preprocessors such as Sass.
test: Know how to write tests with Jest and Storybook.
tool: Know how to package web pages with Webpack and use Git for version control.
i18next: Know how to make a multilingual website with i18next.
